hooks.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".tool_parameters.file_path // empty"); if [[ "$file_path" =~ test/.*_test\.exs$ ]]; then cd "$PROJECT_ROOT" && mix test.check_mirror; fi'
bash -c 'input=$(cat); command=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".tool_parameters.command // empty"); if [[ "$command" =~ git[[:space:]]+commit ]]; then cd "$PROJECT_ROOT" && mix test.check_mirror; fi'
